sentences.en: ...his severe emotional dysfunction was very clearly apparent.
sentences.cn: ...他情绪的严重异常是显而易见的。

sentences.en: A 17 - year - old - boy with a previous history of gastrointestinal dysfunction had abdominal pain, fever, anorexia.
sentences.cn: 一例17 岁 男孩,有胃肠功能不良史,主诉腹痛 、 发热 、 食欲减退.

sentences.en: After operation well - timed discovery of complication prevention of irreversed nervous dysfunction.
sentences.cn: 术后应及早发现和预防并发症,才能避免出现不可逆的神经功能损害.

sentences.en: All the cases healed without scar formation and no dysfunction.
sentences.cn: 所有病例无增生性瘢痕,无功能障碍.

sentences.en: Conclusion: CDCA can damage mitochondrial membrane structure and result in liver dysfunction.
sentences.cn: 结论: CDCA破坏线粒体膜和引起肝功能减退.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Dysfunction of cerebral hemodynamics is one of the pathogenesis of TIAs.
sentences.cn: 结论: 脑血液动力学障碍是TIA发病机制之一.

sentences.en: Deficiency syndrome of Kidney Yang involves the dysfunction of Hypothalamic - Pituitary - target gland axis.
sentences.cn: 肾阳虚证下丘脑 - 垂体 - 靶腺(肾上腺、甲状腺、性腺及胸腺)轴的功能紊乱.

sentences.en: During defecatory maneuvers , 19 spina bifida patients ( 90.5 % ) exhibited pelvic floor dysfunction.
sentences.cn: 在行模拟排便动作时, 19例 ( 90.5% ) 患者表现为盆底功能紊乱型肛管压力变化.

sentences.en: During the follow - up , 3 patients died of multiple organ dysfunction syndrome.
sentences.cn: 7例患者 随访 其中3例死于多功能脏器衰竭.

sentences.en: Endothelial dysfunction and cell loss are prominent features of cardiovascular disease.
sentences.cn: 内皮细胞的脱失和功能障碍是心血管疾病中的突出特征.

sentences.en: How are diastolic dysfunction or diastolic heart failure diagnosed in hypertension?
sentences.cn: 高血压患者如何诊断舒张功能不全或舒张性心力衰竭?

sentences.en: Lung is the mainly involved targeting organ of multiple organ dysfunction syndrome.
sentences.cn: 肺是多器官功能障碍综合征最主要的靶器官.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the pathogenesis of olfactory dysfunction caused by sinusitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨鼻窦炎引起的嗅觉障碍的发病机制.

sentences.en: Premature Ejaculation ( PE ) is most common sexual dysfunction in men.
sentences.cn: 早泄 ( PE ) 是男性最常见的性功能障碍.

sentences.en: The postulated mechanisms include dysfunction of the limbic or serotoninergic system.
sentences.cn: 假设的机制包括边缘系统或5-羟色胺能系统功能障碍.

sentences.en: They say there are inherent difficulties in diagnosing female sexual dysfunction.
sentences.cn: 他们认为诊断女性性功能障碍存在一些固有的困难.

words.tran_cn: 非优生学的；对人类有不良影响的
[耳鼻喉] 构音障碍；构音困难
计算障碍；（脑伤或疾病所致的）计算困难
生殖障碍，不孕；发育不全
难语症；[医] 诵读困难；阅读障碍
功能紊乱；机能障碍；官能不良
功能失调；出现机能障碍；垮掉

trans.tran_en: If you refer to a dysfunction in something such as a relationship or someone's behaviour, you mean that it is different from what is considered to be normal.
